fw.name: AdvancedTopologicalOpe
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATFrFTopologicalSweep
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that computes swept surfaces.

method.name: ChooseOriginGuide
method.abstract: Internal use.

method.name: GetAllProfiles
method.abstract: Returns the computed curves at a given section of the sweep.

method.name: GetFrame
method.abstract: Retrieves the moving frame at a given ratio parameter.

method.name: GetNonCoupledSectionVertices
method.abstract: Gets vertices non coupled by automatic section vertices coupling.

method.name: GetProfilePosition
method.abstract: Retrieves the axes system of the profile (Sweep unspec.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetSpine
method.abstract: Returns the spine.

method.name: GetTwistedAreas
method.abstract: Retrieves the limiting parameters of the twisted areas ot the wrap areas.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetAnchorPoints
method.abstract: Defines the anchor points for profile positionning.

method.name: SetAngularLaw
method.abstract: Defines an angular law to rotate the moving frame around its <tt>Z</tt> axis.

method.name: SetAngularLaw
method.abstract: Defines an angular law to rotate the moving frame around its <tt>Z</tt> axis.

method.name: SetAngularLaws
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAngularLaws
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAngularLawsInDegree
method.abstract: Defines the angular laws for defining limiting guides.

method.name: SetAreasToEliminate
method.abstract: Defines the vertices limiting areas to eliminate from final sweep.

method.name: SetCanonicSurfacesDetection
method.abstract: Sets the canonic surfaces detection mode (cones/cylinders/planes).

method.name: SetCleanGuidesOption
method.abstract: Defines clean guides option, and clean parameter values.

method.name: SetCleanProfilesOption
method.abstract: Defines clean profiles option, and clean parameter values.

method.name: SetClosureMode
method.abstract: Asks for the body closure.

method.name: SetConeOption
method.abstract: Defines cone option for segment sweep computation with reference element (behaves like a draft computation).

method.name: SetCouplingGuides
method.abstract: Defines additional guides to be used only for profile sections coupling.

method.name: SetFunctionalGuides
method.abstract: Defines the references for the (start and end) angles measurement for a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetGuideContinuityCondition
method.abstract: Sets the continuity constraints (for multi profiles sweep) for a guide.

method.name: SetLengthLaws
method.abstract: Defines the length laws for a segment sweep.

method.name: SetLengthLaws
method.abstract: Defines the length laws for a segment sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuideSlopeCondition
method.abstract: Defines a slope condition for a conic or a circle sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuideSlopeCondition
method.abstract: Defines a slope condition for a conic or a circle sweep.

method.name: SetLimitGuides
method.abstract: Defines the limiting guides of a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetMiddleGuides
method.abstract: Defines the guide defining the center of the circle for a segment or circle sweep.

method.name: SetPlanesDetection
method.abstract: Sets the plane detection mode.

method.name: SetProfileAutomaticCouplingMode
method.abstract: Defines the profile automatic coupling mode.

method.name: SetProfileContinuityCondition
method.abstract: Sets the continuity constraints on start and end profiles (for multi profiles sweep).

method.name: SetProfileOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the profiles orientation (for multi profiles sweep).

method.name: SetProfilePosition
method.abstract: Defines the axes system of the profile.

method.name: SetProfilePositionType
method.abstract: Definition of profile positioning type for a sweep with one or two guides (Sweep unspec and birail).

method.name: SetProfileScalingOption
method.abstract: Defines the scaling mode to apply to the profile.

method.name: SetRadiusLaw
method.abstract: Defines the radius law of a circle sweep.

method.name: SetRadiusLaw
method.abstract: Defines the radius law of a circle sweep.

method.name: SetReferenceElement
method.abstract: Defines a variable viewing direction (sweep unspec).

method.name: SetRelimitationMode
method.abstract: Sets the relimitation mode by the extremity profiles.

method.name: SetSimplification
method.abstract: Sets the simplification mode.

method.name: SetSmoothAngleThreshold
method.abstract: Defines the smooth angle threshold.

method.name: SetSmoothOption
method.abstract: Defines a smooth option for moving frame and comb extraction.

method.name: SetSolutionChoice
method.abstract: Defines the conic, circle or segment to keep if case of ambiguous case.

method.name: SetSpine
method.abstract: Defines the spine.

method.name: SetTwistDetection
method.abstract: Defines the twist detection mode.

method.name: SetUntwistMode
method.abstract: Defines the untwist mode, in which every twisted area will be computed.

method.name: SetWrapDetection
method.abstract: Defines the wrap detection mode.

method.name: ValidateCaseNumber
method.abstract: Checks the input data according to the sweep case.

class.name: CATGeometrySizeOptimization
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that optimizes the size of a factory by cleaning extrapolated geometries.

method.name: GetDiagnosis
method.abstract: Returns the diagnosis of the computation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetForgetNURBSOriginalLimits
method.abstract: Cleans the NURBS objects without keeping the original limits (only the useful limits will be kept).

class.name: CATSkinExtrapolation
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that extrapolates a surface in tangency.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the CATSkinExtrapolation operator.

method.name: SetBorderMode
method.abstract: Specifies the type of extrapolation.

method.name: SetLength
method.abstract: Specifies the extrapolation length.

class.name: CATThickenOp
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that thickens a skin body into a volume body.

method.name: Append
method.abstract: This API must not be used.

method.name: GetBooleanResult
method.abstract: Returns the body created from the Boolean operation between a given body and the thickened body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the created thickened body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetBooleanOperation
method.abstract: Defines a Boolean operation between a given body and the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetCleverRibbonComputation
method.abstract: Robust ThickSurface.

method.name: SetSharpBorderMode
method.abstract: Defines how borders are transformed in the neighborhood of sharp edges.

class.name: CATTopBlend
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that connects two wires with a skin.

method.name: GetDefaultTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Retrieves the default TransitionOrientation defined by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetDefaultWireOrientation
method.abstract: Retrieves the default WireOrientation defined by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Get the TransitionOrientation used by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetWireOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the wire used by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetBorderMode
method.abstract: Specifies where the blend boundaries are to be tangent to the support boundaries.

method.name: SetCleanGuidesOption
method.abstract: Defines clean guides option, and clean parameter values.

method.name: SetCouplingLines
method.abstract: Defines coupling lines.

method.name: SetCouplingMode
method.abstract: Defines the coupling mode.

method.name: SetSmoothAngleThreshold
method.abstract: Defines the smooth angle threshold.

method.name: SetSmoothOption
method.abstract: Defines a smooth option for moving frame, coupling and comb extraction.

method.name: SetTransitionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria to take into account for a given wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Set the TransitionOrientation used by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetWireOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the orientation of the wire to be used by <tt>this</tt> operator(<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

class.name: CATTopCleanCrvOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to clean a wire body.

method.name: GetCellReduction
method.abstract: Retrieve the current status of cell reduction defined on operator.

method.name: GetContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Retrieve the current continuity level to improve defined on operator.

method.name: GetDescendantEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the result edge corresponding to an input edge.

method.name: GetDescendantVertex
method.abstract: Retrieves the result vertex corresponding to an input vertex.

method.name: GetMaxDeformationLocation
method.abstract: Returns the 3D location on the input wire and the 3D location on the output (corrected) wire corresponding to the maximum reached deformation.

method.name: GetMaxReachedDeformation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum deformation between input and output wires.

method.name: SetApplyMappingOfInitialVertices
method.abstract: Allows the activation of the mapping of the input vertices to the output vertices.

method.name: SetC1ToC2Management
method.abstract: Defines the way to treat non-C2 edges.

method.name: SetCellReduction
method.abstract: Reduce the number of cells after curvature correction.

method.name: SetConnexityGap
method.abstract: Defines the point continuity criterion for G0 correction.

method.name: SetConnexityMinGap
method.abstract: Defines the point continuity criterion below which the G0 correction is not applied.

method.name: SetContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level to achieve on the wire.

method.name: SetCurvatureRatio
method.abstract: Defines the curvature criterion for G2 correction.

method.name: SetEndExtremityContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level at the END extremity between the input wire and the result wire.

method.name: SetFixedCells
method.abstract: Defines the set of input edges and vertices that must stay unmodified through the operator.

method.name: SetForceOneEdgeImprovement
method.abstract: Combined with cell reduction mode, forces the operator to treat either the one-edge-wire case or any one edge case situated between two unsuppressed vertices.

method.name: SetMaxDeformation
method.abstract: Defines the maximum deformation allowed between the output and input bodies.

method.name: SetMinimumEdgeLength
method.abstract: Defines the minimum size of an edge to be corrected.

method.name: SetModeODT
method.abstract: This API should not be used.

method.name: SetPriorityMode
method.abstract: Defines the priority mode of cleaning operations.

method.name: SetShell
method.abstract: Defines the 2D cleaning mode.

method.name: SetShell
method.abstract: Defines the 2D cleaning mode with optional topological wire on shell " LyingOnLink " recovery.

method.name: SetSmartClosure
method.abstract: To use on Closed Wire with SetCellReduction or SetApplyMappingOfInitialVertices only.

method.name: SetStartExtremityContinuityLevel
method.abstract: Defines the highest continuity level at the START extremity between the input wire and the result wire.

method.name: SetTangencyAngle
method.abstract: Defines the tangency criteria for G1 correction.

method.name: SetTangencyMinAngle
method.abstract: Defines the tangency criterion below which the G1 correction is not applied.

class.name: CATTopMostContinuousGeoInWireOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to recover the most continuous geometry of a body wire.

method.name: GetDump
method.abstract: Do not use.

class.name: CATTopShellOrientation
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that modifies the orientation of the faces of a shell as well as the underlying surfaces so that the faces, the surfaces and the shell all have the same orientation.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopSimilarCurve
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that connects two wires with the "Base Curve" option.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetEndPoint
method.abstract: Defines the end point.

method.name: SetStartPoint
method.abstract: Defines the start point.

method.name: SetTrimmingMode
method.abstract: Defines whether the input bodies must be trimmed.

class.name: CATTopSpine
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that creates a spine.

method.name: ImposePointOnProfile
method.abstract: Defines an imposed point of the spine.

method.name: SetGuides
method.abstract: Defines the guides to refine the definition of the spine.

method.name: SetProfileContinuityCondition
method.abstract: Sets the continuity constraints on a profile.

method.name: SetRelimitationMode
method.abstract: Defines the relimitation mode for spine computation.

class.name: CATTopSweep
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator that sweeps a profile.

method.name: SetExtrudeLimit
method.abstract: Defines the type of limitation of each extremity along the extrusion (center curve) direction.

method.name: SetPullingDirection
method.abstract: Defines the pulling direction to replace the previously specified spine.

method.name: GetMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode of creation of the blend surface.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetTwistTreatment
method.abstract: Returns the level of the twist detection (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: GetValidity
method.abstract: Returns the result of the twist detection.

method.name: SetBasicTangencyContinuityMode
method.abstract: Defines the way of construction of the second rank of control points of the blend surface (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetDefaultConfiguration
method.abstract: Retrieves the default orientations taken by <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetMode
method.abstract: Defines the mode of creation of the blend surface (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTransitionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria to take into account for a given wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the relative orientation of the wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTwistTreatment
method.abstract: Defines the level of twist detection (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetWireOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the relative orientation of the wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

class.name: CATTopologicalBlendCurve
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that connects two wire bodies.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCurvatureParameter
method.abstract: Defines the influence of the curvature constraint (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Defines the topological blend curve limits (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetCurveParam
method.abstract: Defines the topological blend curve limits (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetDefaultConfiguration
method.abstract: Returns the starting direction keeping the wire of greatest length (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetSupportTrimmingMode
method.abstract: Defines whether the input bodies must be trimmed (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTangencyParameter
method.abstract: Defines the influence of the tangency constraint (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTransitionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria to take into account for a given wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: SetTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Modifies the starting direction of the connecting wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: GetOrientation
method.abstract: Returns the orientation of the skin bodies used to define the center of the fillet.

method.name: GetPreviewResult
method.abstract: Returns two CATBody containing the bitangencies curves.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetSplitSupport1
method.abstract: Returns the created split surface.

method.name: GetSplitSupport2
method.abstract: Returns the created split surface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetBuildMode
method.abstract: Defines the mode of creation of the blend surface.

method.name: SetMaxLengthOfMerge
method.abstract: Defines the minimum length of a valid edge along the bitangency path.

method.name: SetOrientation
method.abstract: Defines the orientation of the skin bodies used to define the center of the fillet.

method.name: SetRadius
method.abstract: Defines the input value of the fillet blend surface.

method.name: SetTangencyContinuityMode
method.abstract: Defines the way of construction of the second rank of control points of the blend surface.

method.name: SetTransitionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria to take into account for a given skin body.

class.name: CATTopologicalMatch
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that matches parts of skin boundaries.

method.name: GetConnectionContinuity
method.abstract: Returns the continuity criteria for <tt>this</tt> matching operation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetDiffusion
method.abstract: Returns the level of diffusion of the deformation on the whole surface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetGlobalCurvatureParameter
method.abstract: Retrieves the stiffness on the matching zone in case of both matching and <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: GetGlobalTangentParameter
method.abstract: Retrieves the stiffness on the matching zone in case of both matching and <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: GetMatchFactor
method.abstract: Returns the match factor.

method.name: GetOppositeSideContinuity
method.abstract: Returns the continuity criteria on the boundaries that are not part of the boundaries to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: ReverseRelativeWireOrientation
method.abstract: Asks for reversing the default relative orientation of the wires to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: ReverseTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Asks for reversing the default transition between the surface to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetConnectionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria for <tt>this</tt> matching operation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDefaultRelativeWireOrientation
method.abstract: Asks for the default choice of the relative orientation of the wires to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDefaultTransitionOrientation
method.abstract: Asks for the default choice of the transition between the surface to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDiffusion
method.abstract: Defines the diffusion of the deformation on the whole surface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetGlobalCurvatureParameter
method.abstract: Defines a stiffness on the matching zone in case of both matching and <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetGlobalTangentParameter
method.abstract: Defines a stiffness on the matching zone in case of both matching and <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetMatchFactor
method.abstract: Sets the match factor in case of both matching and <tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode.

method.name: SetOppositeSideContinuity
method.abstract: Defines a continuity criteria on the boundaries that are not part of the boundaries to match (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetOptimization
method.abstract: Asks fot the optimization of the local deformation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UseTheLastRunResult
method.abstract: Defines a new matching operation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

define.name: CATFrFTopologicalSweep_ListPOfCATCurve
define.abstract: Defines a list of computed curves.

function.name: CATCreateFrFTopologicalCircleSweep
function.abstract: Creates a topological circle sweep operator.

function.name: CATCreateFrFTopologicalConicSweep
function.abstract: Creates a topological conic sweep operator.

function.name: CATCreateFrFTopologicalSegmentSweep
function.abstract: Creates a topological segment sweep operator.

function.name: CATCreateFrFTopologicalSweep
function.abstract: Creates a topological sweep operator from a profile and a guide.

function.name: CATCreateFrFTopologicalSweep
function.abstract: Creates a topological sweep operator from several profiles and guides.

function.name: CATCreateGeometrySizeOptimization
function.abstract: Creates a CATGeometrySizeOptimization operator.

function.name: CATCreateSkinExtrapolation
function.abstract: Creates a CATSkinExtrapolation operator.

function.name: CATCreateThickenOp
function.abstract: Creates an operator that thickens a skin body with inside and outside offset values.

function.name: CATCreateTopBlend
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that computes a connecting surface between two wires.

function.name: CATCreateTopCleanCrvOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to clean the curve geometry of a wire.

function.name: CATCreateTopMostContinuousGeoInWireOperator
function.abstract: Do not use.

function.name: CATCreateTopMostContinuousGeoInWireOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to recover the most continuous geometry of a body mono-wire, the geometry of which is defined on ONE body shell.

function.name: CATCreateTopMostContinuousGeoInWireOperator
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator to recover the most continuous geometry of a body mono-wire, the geometry of which is defined on TWO body shells.

function.name: CATCreateTopSimilarCurve
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that connects to curves according to the specification of a base curve.

function.name: CATCreateTopSpine
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSpine operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopSweep
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSweep operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopSweepWireSkinCircleVariable
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopSweepWireSkinCircle operator.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalBlend
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that computes a extrapolation of the surface.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalBlend
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that computes a connecting surface between two wires.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalBlendCurve
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that connects two wire bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalFill
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that fills a closed area defined by a set of wires.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalFill
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that fills a closed area defined by a set of wires.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalFilletBlend
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator that computes the connecting surface between two skin bodies, using a bi-tangency algorithm.

function.name: CATCreateTopologicalMatch
function.abstract: Creates a topological operator of multiple sides matching.
